attributes.action: EU Referendum rules and upholding EU referendum majority result of Leave
attributes.additional_details:
Eligible voters within Great Britain & Gibraltar were given the opportunity to vote democratically in the EU Referendum on 23rd June 2016. The majority vote was to Leave the EU.

It is too late to change the rules under which the country voted to try to adjust the outcome.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to ignore petition https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131215 or any similar petitions and uphold the majority result of the June 2016 EU referendum to leave the EU.
